Package org.opendaylight.controller.usermanager

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAAAProvider
    IAAAProvider exposes a pluggable interface for 3rd party Authentication and Authorization providers to support the UserManager with AAA management.
    ISessionManager
    This interface defines method(s) to invalidate a session.
    IUserManager
    The Interface which describes the methods exposed by User Manager.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthenticatedUser
    Represents a user that was successfully authenticated and authorized It contains the user role for which the user was authorized and the date on which it was authenticated and authorized
    AuthenticatedUserTest  
    AuthorizationConfig
    Configuration Java Object which represents a Local configured Authorization for a remote authenticated user for User Manager.
    AuthorizationUserConfigTest  
    AuthResponse
    The class describes AAA response status and payload data
    AuthResponseTest  
    ODLUserLevel  
    ServerConfig
    Configuration Java Object which represents a Remote AAA server configuration information for User Manager.
    ServerConfigTest  
    UserConfig
    Configuration Java Object which represents a Local AAA user configuration information for User Manager.
